item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官认为尽管有人工智能，员工数量仍将保持稳定："总是要重新部署
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在其他雇主的裁员浪潮中表示，如果 "我们做得好"，这家美国最大银行的员工人数可能会保持稳定或上升，因为它将继续推出人工智能。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon — weighing in amid a wave of job cuts at other employers — said headcount at the largest US bank will probably remain steady or rise as it continues to roll out artificial intelligence, if “we do a good job.”】

item.title: EQT 支持的生物技术公司 Evommune 首次公开募股融资 1.5 亿美元
item.description: Evommune Inc.是一家针对慢性炎症性疾病的生物技术公司，该公司在首次公开募股中募集到了1.5亿美元，成为在美国政府停摆的情况下仍能继续上市的公司中的一员。【原文：Evommune Inc., a biotechnology company targeting chronic inflammatory diseases, raised $150 million in an initial public offering, adding to the list of companies that have been able to proceed with listings despite the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 耐克斯佩里亚称因中国供应商拒付货款而停止供货
item.description: Nexperia 表示，由于中国工厂拒绝付款，该公司暂停了对中国工厂的供货，这暴露了这家陷入困境的汽车芯片制造商的内部不和。【原文：Nexperia said it suspended supplies to its China factory because the local unit refused to make payments, laying bare the internal discord at the embattled automotive chipmaker.】

item.title: 谨慎迹象显现，沙特下调对亚洲的主要油价
item.description: 在欧佩克+表示计划明年初暂停增加供应几天后，沙特阿拉伯下调了其主要石油等级 12 月份对亚洲的价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia lowered the price of its main oil grade to Asia for December, days after OPEC+ said it planned to pause supply increases early next year.】

item.title: 日本执政集团的合作伙伴警告日本央行加息信号不一
item.description: 日本执政联盟的领导人认为，在政府呼吁企业加大投资的同时，日本央行提高利率的举动很可能会在政策上传递出一种混合的信息。【原文：A Bank of Japan move to raise interest rates at a time when the government is calling on companies to invest more would likely send a mixed message on policy, according to the leader of Japan’s ruling coalition partner.】

item.title: 交易商评估美国利率前景，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在创下约一周以来的最大涨幅后趋于稳定，因为交易商在私营部门就业数据公布后对美国利率前景进行了评估。【原文：Gold steadied after the biggest gain in about a week, as traders assessed the outlook for US interest rates following private-sector jobs data.】

item.title: MSCI 全球指数回顾：新增 69 家公司，剔除 64 家公司
item.description: 摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）在其季度审查中将 69 家公司纳入其所有国家的世界指数，其中包括 CoreWeave 公司、Nebius 集团和 Insmed 公司。【原文：MSCI Inc. added 69 companies to its all country world index in its quarterly review, including CoreWeave Inc., Nebius Group and Insmed Inc.】

item.title: 施瓦布将以约 6 亿美元收购私人股票平台
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Charles Schwab Corp. is slated to acquire Forge Global Holdings Inc., a marketplace for buying and selling private company shares, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 因财政赤字和养老金问题，S&P 将芝加哥前景下调一档
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提议明年补充部分养老金缴款，因为该市正努力应对连续赤字和储备金减少的问题，S&P 全球评级公司周三将芝加哥的信用展望下调一个等级至负面。【原文：Chicago had its credit outlook lowered one notch to negative by S&P Global Ratings on Wednesday after Mayor Brandon Johnson proposed a partial supplemental pension contribution next year as the city grapples with back-to-back deficits and weaker reserves.】

item.title: 英国企业在预算案中警告 "千税之死
item.description: 英国最大的商业游说团体警告蕾切尔-里夫斯在编制今年的预算时，不要用一系列较小幅度的增税来打击企业，称她应该 "优先考虑长期繁荣，而不是短期思维"。【原文：The UK’s biggest business lobby warned Rachel Reeves against hitting companies with a series of smaller tax rises as she prepares this year’s budget, saying she should “prioritize long-term prosperity over short-term thinking.”】

item.title: 预算案迫在眉睫，英国央行将把利率维持在 4%：决策指南
item.description: 英国央行可能会在周四维持利率不变，这一决定将结束连续几个季度的降息。【原文：The Bank of England will likely keep interest rates unchanged on Thursday in a closely contested decision that would end a run of quarterly reductions.】

item.title: 泰国长期限债券吸引全球基金追捧
item.description: 泰国的较长期限债券在上个月大幅下挫后吸引了全球投资者的目光，因为持续的通货紧缩重新燃起了人们对央行降息的预期。【原文：Thailand’s longer tenor bonds are drawing in global investors after a sharp selloff last month as persistent deflation revives expectations of interest-rate cuts from the central bank.】

item.title: 特朗普称最高法院撤销关税将是 "毁灭性的
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，如果最高法院否决他的政府在全球范围内征收的关税，那将是 "对我们国家的毁灭性打击"，因为在周三的口头辩论中，主要法官对他是否越权提出了质疑。【原文：President Donald Trump said it would be “devastating for our country” if the Supreme Court struck down his administration’s sweeping global tariffs after key justices questioned whether he overstepped his authority during oral arguments Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本工资增长保持坚挺，加息赌注仍在继续
item.description: 日本 9 月份的基本工资增长保持稳定，这使得日本央行继续保持紧缩政策，同时市场也在寻找该行下一步行动的触发因素。【原文：Japan’s underlying wage growth remained steady in September, keeping the Bank of Japan on its tightening path as markets look for triggers for the bank’s next move.】

item.title: 预计下半年业绩将恢复增长，Coty股票大涨
item.description: 科蒂公司（Coty Inc. ）重申其对下半财年同类销售额复苏的预测，并表示本季度的业务将强于前三个月，之后该公司股价大涨。【原文：Coty Inc. shares jumped after the beauty company reiterated its forecast for like-for-like sales to recover in the second half of its fiscal year and said business in the current quarter will be stronger than in the prior three months.】

item.title: 美国库存创七月以来最大增幅后，石油连续两天保持跌势
item.description: 由于美国能源信息署证实美国石油库存出现了自 7 月份以来的最大增幅，石油在连续两日下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day decline, as the Energy Information Administration confirmed the biggest increase in US stockpiles since July.】

item.title: 中国卡车公司的传奇故事暴露美国国家安全漏洞
item.description:
美国官员认为他们已经与TuSimple达成了一项协议，以保护自动驾驶技术。【原文：

American officials thought they’d secured a deal with TuSimple to protect autonomous-driving technology. It didn’t work. 

】

item.title: Pony AI、WeRide 在香港机器人出租车上市对决后可能下跌
item.description: Pony AI 公司和 WeRide 公司在香港开始交易时可能会下跌，因为这两家中国机器人出租车公司在公开发行股票时争夺投资者，共募集了超过 11 亿美元的资金。【原文：Pony AI Inc. and WeRide Inc. may fall when they begin trading in Hong Kong after the pair of Chinese robotaxi firms battled for investors for their public offerings, which raised more than $1.1 billion.】

item.title: 财富管理费激增，星展银行利润超预期
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）公布的利润高于预期，主要得益于其财富管理业务的持续发展势头和强劲的贸易收入。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. posted higher-than-expected profit supported by sustained momentum in its wealth management business and robust trading income.】

item.title: 华尔街上涨后，亚洲股市也将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市跟随华尔街的步伐准备反弹，华尔街在科技股短暂回落后买盘介入，美国劳动力市场复苏的迹象提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to rebound Thursday, following Wall Street’s lead, where buyers stepped in after a brief retreat in technology shares and signs of a resilient US labor market boosted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 大都会人寿盈利超预期，私募股权投资获得收益
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife Inc.【原文：MetLife Inc. reported third-quarter earnings that edged out Wall Street expectations as returns on private equity investments rose.】

item.title: Fortinet 因最大收入部门未达预期而下跌
item.description: 网络安全公司 Fortinet Inc. 的服务部门收入不及预期，导致其业绩下滑。【原文：The cybersecurity company Fortinet Inc. sank as revenue in its service segment missed expectations.】

item.title: 在连续几周需求低迷之后，Energos 公司达成了 15 亿美元的垃圾邮件协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于液化天然气运输船运营商难以吸引投资者的需求，Energos Infrastructure 已搁置了 15 亿美元的垃圾债券销售计划。【原文：Energos Infrastructure has shelved a $1.5 billion junk-bond sale as the liquefied natural gas carrier operator struggled to attract investor demand, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 最高法院关税减免引发梅西百货和美泰股价大涨
item.description: 美国一些顶级零售品牌，从百货公司到玩具制造商和服装公司，其股票周三均出现反弹，原因是美国最高法院持怀疑态度，这增加了今年对该行业造成压力的全面关税可能被取消的希望。【原文：Stocks in some of America’s top retail brands, from department stores to toymakers and apparel companies, rallied Wednesday as a skeptical US Supreme Court raised hopes the sweeping tariffs that have weighed on the sector this year could be lifted.】

item.title: 瑞波总裁朗称 "无计划、无时间表 "上市
item.description: 瑞波公司（Ripple）是一家专注于加密货币的金融技术公司，目前没有任何计划加入最近上市或表示希望在不久的将来上市的数十家数字资产公司的行列。【原文：Ripple, the crypto-focused financial technology firm, doesn’t have any immediate plans to join the scores of digital asset companies that have recently gone public or expressed aspirations to do so in the near future.】

item.title: 美联储让银行更容易获得 "管理良好 "评级
item.description: 美联储周三表示，已最终确定对大型银行监管评级框架的修改，放宽了对某些贷款机构的要求。【原文：The Federal Reserve said Wednesday it had finalized changes to its supervisory rating framework for large banks, easing the requirements for certain lenders.】

item.title: 巴西将利率维持在近二十年高位以抗击通胀
item.description: 周三，巴西将其关键利率维持在近二十年来的高位不变，凸显了央行继续严厉打击顽固通胀的决心。【原文：Brazil held its key interest rate unchanged at a near two-decade high on Wednesday, underscoring the central bank’s resolve to stay tough on stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 拉姆-伊曼纽尔为美国开出的药方是 "返璞归真
item.description:
这位前芝加哥市长表示，将资金投入研究和教育是实现 "美国梦 "的可行之道。他也不排除竞选总统的可能性。【原文：

The former Chicago mayor says pouring money into research and education is the way to make the “American Dream” viable. He also won’t rule out a run for president.

】

item.title: Robinhood 加密货币收入不及预期，首席财务官第一季度离职
item.description: 面向散户投资者的在线经纪公司 Robinhood Markets Inc. 公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，但加密货币收入不足。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc., the online brokerage that caters to retail investors, reported a third-quarter profit that beat Wall Street expectations but fell short on cryptocurrency revenue.】

item.title: Figma 对扩大产品套件的影响作出有力展望
item.description: 今年早些时候上市的设计软件公司 Figma Inc. 展望本季度收入和利润将好于预期，并吹捧新产品的采用。【原文：Figma Inc., a design software company that went public earlier this year, gave an outlook for better-than-expected quarterly revenue and profit, touting the adoption of new products.】
